00056 class Condition
00057 {
00058 public:
00059         Condition();
00060 
00061         ~Condition();
00062 
00063         void init(CharType type, vector<CharType>& preTypes, vector<CharType>& noPreTypes,
00064                                 vector<CharType>& NextTypes, vector<CharType>& noNextTypes,
00065                                 set<CharValue>& nextChars, bool isEnd = false);
00066 
00067         CharType getType() const
00068         {
00069                 return type_;
00070         }
00071 
00075         bool match( CharType preType, CharValue nextValue, CharType nextType ) const;
00076 
00080         bool equals( Condition& other );
00081 
00082     friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& sout, const Condition& cond )
00083     {
00084         sout<<"type: "<<cond.type_<<", ";
00085         sout<<"isPre: "<<cond.isSetPreTypes_;
00086         if(cond.isSetPreTypes_)
00087         {
00088                 sout<<" ( ";
00089                 for( int i = 0; i < CHAR_TYPE_NUM; ++i )
00090                         sout<<!cond.noPreTypes_[i]<<", ";
00091                 sout<<")";
00092         }
00093 
00094         sout<<", isNext: "<<cond.isSetNextTypes_;
00095         if(cond.isSetNextTypes_)
00096         {
00097                 sout<<" ( ";
00098                 for( int i = 0; i < CHAR_TYPE_NUM; ++i )
00099                         sout<<!cond.noNextTypes_[i]<<", ";
00100                 sout<<")";
00101         }
00102 
00103         const set<CharValue>& nextChars = cond.nextChars_;
00104         sout<<", nextCharSize: "<<nextChars.size();
00105 
00106         if( !nextChars.empty() )
00107                 {
00108                         sout<<" ( ";
00109                         for( set<CharValue>::const_iterator itr = nextChars.begin();
00110                                         itr != nextChars.end(); ++itr )
00111                                 sout<<getDecodeChar( *itr )<<", ";
00112                         sout<<")";
00113                 }
00114 
00115         sout<< ", isEnd: " << cond.isEnd_;
00116         return sout;
00117     }
00118

00123         void setTypesArray(bool& isSegFlag, bool *noTypes, vector<CharType>& allowTypes,
